title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices        Following are the current permanent staff at Fort Scott National Historic Site. Use the park phone number (620-223-0310) to contact any of the individuals below.     Administration     Betty Boyko Superintendent   Janette Danley Secretary   Marie Sigafoos Administrative Officer   Sharon Shirley Adminstrative Support Assistant           Interpretation and Resource Management      Holly Baker Chief of Interpretation & Resource Management   Bill Fischer Historian    Galen Ewing  Park Ranger    Barak Geertsen  Park Ranger    Dottie Messer Park Guide    Vacant Museum Technician                 Facility Management     Russell Conner Facility Manager    Tim Jackson Maintenance Mechanic    Vacant  (Charles Corpstein - temp)  Laborer    Vacant Carpenter
